entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 08:44 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
